Test_Prompt_Title: Enter the relative API you want to test (eg. /api/foo)
Archive_Addon_Paragraph: New entry called data retention undeer company profile. It will allow to define archive policy for operational data - activities, transactions, transaction lines (loading to nucleus).
Archive_Addon_Schedule_Paragraph: Set a weekly schedule here. the module will include configuration mode based on activity history and advance mode(for system admin) allowing build advance login using code.
Archive_Addon_Policy_Paragraph: One number in months defining the data retention per all objects - global history(in months) to be aloaded to the operational data and option to define it per object.
